origins.title: The 'Factory Model' of Cybersecurity
origins.p1: In modern Smart Manufacturing (e.g., at Olam Food Ingredients or Siemens factories), there is a critical distinction between "Edge Autonomy" and "Cloud Analytics".
origins.p2: A robotic arm on an assembly line cannot wait for the cloud to tell it to stop if a safety sensor is tripped‚Äîit must have a spinal reflex (Edge). However, the decision to retool the line for a new product requires massive data analysis (Cloud).
origins.p3: AEON applies this exact physics to cybersecurity. Agent Blue is the "Factory Floor" reflex‚Äîstopping attacks in milliseconds. AEON Core is the "Headquarters" strategy‚Äîanalyzing global patterns to predict the next war.

calculus.title: The Calculus of Defense
